page.title: 11News in Hove and Portslade
page.content: Hove is a very densely populated area.The highest percentage of residents are the elderly,which constitutes problems for the rest of the community.These people often appear in the news on account of small accidents in their homes.An elderly man was treated after a small fire in his kitchen; a pan of food caught alight.These accidents occur because of the inability of the elderly to look after themselves all the time. Hove's local football club,Brighton & Hove Albion have avoided an alcoholic drinks ban in their private club where other clubs have failed. Portslade has lost 217 jobs at the Metal Box plant.The workforce was said to be too large and jobs had to be axed.The south is luckily not a job blackspot but a loss like this can demoralise the local unemployed.
